name: Resume (Anthony O)
description:
Best you face her sooner rather than later, you suppose. What’s the worst that could happen, anyway?

Resume is a visual novel set in a 2D club space and taking place in a post pandemic world. It captures a feeling, a specific moment, as after months of being stuck at home you finally head out to a party and are forced to navigate difficult relationships with your friends. It's a game about connections, crushes, queer relationships and how other people influence us.

Features:

  • 3 different endings!   
  • original art, music and script   
  • around 15 - 30 minutes of gameplay   
  • a cast of cool queer characters

Content warnings: mentions of drugs and their effects (including negative ones), flashing lights

Credits:

Art - Myrto C

Music - Maks (soundcloud)

Script - Anthony O and Myrto C

Programming - Anthony O (twitter)
